sentence.Network_en: Every word of the Toran braided crowns for the Godhead.

sentence.Network_en: The Godhead is made up of God, Jesus and The Holy Spirit.

sentence.Network_en: For in him dwelleth all the fulness of the Godhead bodily.
sentence.Network_cn: 因为神本性一切的丰盛,都有形有体的居住在基督里面.
